name: Up Hill Racing: Car Climbing
description:
One of the best simple and fun racing games for families! This free game is made for everyone, so feel free to play yourself or invite your kids to watch or play together. Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your car with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on it's way. Use tilt control for better results and more exciting jumps. Other racing games become boring because of hard levels or controls? This is what you were looking for! Fast, simple and exciting car racing!

The tracks are designed so that you would do many stunts on the run, the car will spin doing front flips, backflips or even both - but watch out not to land on the roof! The comic cars are kids-friendly and cartoon soundtrack makes the mood ready for the awesome ride! This game will also help with hand-eye coordination!
